title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9001.4 - Hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9001.4 - Hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations

The authority shall accept requests for records and produce
records from 9 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9001.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
